songs.title: Judas (Thomas Gold Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Lady Gaga]
When he calls to me, I am ready
I'll wash his feet with my hair if he needs
Forgive him when his tongue lies through his brain
Even after three times he betrays me

[Instrumental: Thomas Gold]

[Bridge: Lady Gaga]
I wanna love you
I wanna love you
I wanna love you
I wanna love you

I wanna love you
I wanna love you
I wanna love you
I wanna love you

I wanna love you (Wanna)
I wanna love you (Wanna)
I wanna love you (Wanna)
I wanna love you (Wanna)

I wanna love you (Wanna love you)
I wanna love you (Wanna love you)
I wanna love you (Wanna love you)
I wanna love you

I wanna love you

[Instrumental: Thomas Gold]

[Verse 1: Lady Gaga]
When he calls to me, I am ready
I'll wash his feet with my hair if he needs
Forgive him when his tongue lies through his brain
Even after three times he betrays me
